project

Class DOMWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.DOMWriter

  • public class DOMWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Writes an xml representation of the order results. Loads xml order results to memory and appends new results.
    Author:
    pig
    See Also:
    MyValidationException
